resources.string: Internet Access and Location Services required to navigate sessions.

Internet Access required to create/find sessions.

Adam Warrington - adamW@quickstudy.ca
Ruel John Cootauco - rueljC@quickstudy.ca
Raymond Dang - raymondD@quickstudy.ca

For more inquiries, please visit our website quickstudy.ca

Q. How do I use this?
A. There are two ways - you can create a session for people to come to you, or find one through the lists of hosts.

Q. Do I need to pay?
A. No.

Q. Can I find any session anywhere?
A. The app has a 0.5km radius to track other sessions.
QuickStudy is an educational android app for students who are in search, or in aid of providing study sessions.
